name: Dubstep and Electronic Maker with Audio Recording
name_original: Dubstep and Electronic Maker with Audio Recording
description:
Dubstep Recorder App is finally here!! Now you can record, edit & share your dubstep piece free today!

Create amazing sounding dubstep music and at last RECORD it for future listening and sharing with Dubstep Recorder.
+ Features +
* Full screen sound & video recording
* 40 playable pads
* HD Drum Loops, Synth Loops, FX, Vocals
* Loop Feature on 24 pads
* Everyplay - hands down the best way to watch & share awesome replays
* Powerful high quality sounds

Share your Dubstep Recorder masterpiece on Facebook, Youtube, Twitter, Email and Everyplay.
Post your smash hit today!

Now in addition to captivating your listening audience live you can now fascinate them later with our new recording feature.

Thank you very much for being our customer. We appreciate each & every download...
